devdoc.author: alessandromaci
devdoc.details: This contract has been developed to facilitate escrowed transactions between parties.

params.evidenceCID: The content identifier for the evidence.

returns._0: bool True if the agreement is locked, otherwise false.

params.tokenAddress: Address of the ERC20 token (use ethereum for ETH).

params.inFavorOfBuyer: Boolean indicating if the decision is in favor of the buyer.

devdoc.title: Escrow Contract

agreementIsLocked(uint256).notice: Check if an agreement is locked.

buyerRejectsReceipt(uint256).notice: Reject the receipt as a buyer.

createAgreement(address,address,uint256,.notice: Creates an agreement between a buyer and seller.

executeDecision(uint256,bool).notice: Execute the decision of the judge.

sellerConfirmsAgreement(uint256).notice: Confirm an agreement as the seller.

userdoc.notice: This contract manages trustless escrows for buyer-seller transactions.
